fpdc2-decrease 2 fpdc made together fpdc front post double_crochet puff-stitch there s a video this rug is made as a spiral to avoid that ugly seam that always appears along the beginning/ending of a round so we don t join the rounds with a slip_stitch i made some photos for the first ten rounds but after that you ll have to make do with written instructions and the chart it s on the last page round #1 make 7 single_crochet in the magic loop and pull the loop tight then make the 8th single_crochet into the leg of the 1st single_crochet - it will appear somewhat sideways do not close any round with a slip_stitch we will work in a spiral all the way to the end you have 8 single_crochet round #2 make an single_crochet-increase in every single_crochet you have 8*2 = 16 single_crochet all
